name: Salvation the Dragonlord
text: This card cannot be normal summoned/set. This card must be special summoned by the effect of "Divine Egg of Salvation" this card cannot be special summoned by any other ways. Once per turn During either players turn: you can discard 1 Dragon monster card to the GY then banish 1 card your opponent controls with the same attribute as the discarded monster. This card is uneffected by opponent card effects.
